sentences.en: But I now suspect that Dr. Liew was just showing a common human frailty.
sentences.cn: 但我怀疑刘博士只是表露了人类常见的脆弱性格.

sentences.en: But we must recognize that our human frailty makes it challenging to mete out true justice.
sentences.cn: 但我们需要认清人性的弱点使公义的彰显充满挑战.

sentences.en: Conceals own frequently frailty, good laborious.
sentences.cn: 常常掩饰自己的脆弱, 好辛苦.

sentences.en: Despite increasing physical frailty, he continued to write stories.
sentences.cn: 尽管身体越来越虛弱, 他仍然继续写小说.

sentences.en: Do you look forward to old age, or do you dread frailty, loss of memory and dependence on others?
sentences.cn: 你是期望变老，还是害怕自己年迈体衰、记忆减退，而且还要依赖他人？

sentences.en: Don't always confide your trouble to your friends and show your frailty.
sentences.cn: 不要总是倾诉你的麻烦你的朋友,展示您的脆弱性.

sentences.en: He paused and suddenly all the frailty and fatigue showed.
sentences.cn: 他顿住了,虚弱与疲惫一下子显露出来.

sentences.en: Increasing frailty meant that she was more and more confined to bed.
sentences.cn: 日益衰弱意味着她愈来愈需要卧床。

sentences.en: Love is noblest frailty of mind.
sentences.cn: 爱情是心灵最高尚的弱点.

sentences.en: Love is the noblest frailty of the mind.
sentences.cn: 爱情是理性显示的最高尚的瑕疵.

sentences.en: Then he murmured the words of the English poet,'Frailty, thy name is woman.'
sentences.cn: 然后他轻声地背出了一位英国诗人的诗句: “ ‘ Frailty, thynameiswoman ’ ”[引自莎士比亚的《哈默雷特》一剧中的一句台词.

sentences.en: This is a reflection of their frailty.
This is only a reflection of their frailty.
sentences.cn: 这只是他们虚弱的反映.

sentences.en: We triumph over each other with human frailty.
sentences.cn: 我们以人类的弱点彼此去战胜对方.

sentences.en: Your age and frailty are giving him cause for concern.
sentences.cn: 你的年纪与脆弱给了他关心你的理由.

trans.tran_cn: 脆弱，虚弱，（性格或行为上的）弱点，缺点
trans.tran_en: the lack of strength or health
